Built for UK construction · England & Wales

The compliance platform for
construction occupational health

SiteMedic is the digital backbone for medic agencies and OH providers working in UK construction. RIDDOR auto-flagging, worker health profiles, health surveillance tracking, drug test logging, fitness certificates, and multi-site management — all in one platform.

Stop building spreadsheets. Stop losing records. Stop chasing sign-offs. Go live in a day.

Platform Features

Everything your OH operation needs

From first treatment to annual surveillance reminders — SiteMedic runs your compliance operation so your medics can focus on the work.

Worker Health Profiles

Every worker gets a digital health record. Treatments, surveillance results, drug test outcomes, and fitness certificates — all linked, all searchable.

RIDDOR Auto-Flagging

Every treatment is automatically checked against RIDDOR 2013 criteria. Reportable incidents are flagged with HSE deadlines and pre-filled forms. No manual checking.

Surveillance Reminders

The platform tracks every worker's annual surveillance due dates. Progressive alerts at 30, 14, 7, and 1 day before expiry to managers, admins, and medics.

Offline-First

Construction sites don't always have signal. SiteMedic captures all data locally and syncs automatically the moment connectivity returns. Nothing is ever lost.

Compliance Dashboard

One score. Site managers see their full compliance status at a glance — treatments, surveillance due, RIDDOR flags, near-misses — all in a single view.

Multi-Site Management

Manage every site from one account. Territory-based assignment, medic scheduling, and cross-site reporting all built in. Designed for agencies with multiple clients.

Audit-Ready Records

Every action — every treatment logged, every consent signed, every certificate issued — is timestamped, signed, and stored. HSE-ready on demand.

Invoicing & Payouts

Net-30 invoicing for corporate clients. Weekly medic payouts via UK Faster Payments. Full IR35 assessment workflow. Everything built for UK employment law.

UK GDPR & Security

Health data is sensitive. SiteMedic is UK-hosted, row-level security isolated per organisation, with full audit logging and GDPR-compliant data retention policies.

Clinical Modules

Built for every OH service you deliver

SiteMedic has dedicated modules for each clinical service. Results flow into worker profiles automatically.

Who Uses SiteMedic

Built for the whole chain

One platform. Multiple roles. Everyone sees what they need.

Medic Agencies

Run your entire OH operation — booking management, medic scheduling, territory assignment, invoicing, and compliance reporting — from one admin dashboard.

  • Command centre dispatch
  • Medic roster & certs
  • Revenue analytics
  • Org-level compliance

On-Site Medics

Log treatments and run surveillance checks directly from your phone or tablet, with or without internet. Everything syncs automatically.

  • Offline treatment logging
  • Surveillance test entry
  • D&A test recording
  • Digital consent capture

Site Managers

Your compliance dashboard shows you everything happening on your site — treatments, RIDDOR flags, worker surveillance status, and near-miss reports.

  • Live site overview
  • RIDDOR auto-flagging
  • Worker health status
  • Weekly safety summaries

Construction Companies

Single source of truth for all your sites and all your workers. Annual surveillance due dates tracked. HSE-ready records always on hand.

  • Multi-site dashboard
  • Surveillance due dates
  • PDF compliance reports
  • Audit trail exports

How it works

From sign-up to your first live site in under a day.

1

Create your org

Sign up, configure your organisation, add medics and territories.

2

Set up your sites

Add clients, define sites, assign your medic to the booking.

3

Go live on site

Medic logs in (offline-capable), captures treatments and tests in real time.

4

Auto-compliance

RIDDOR flagged, reminders scheduled, reports generated. Nothing manual.

Pricing

Platform pricing

Software pricing for the SiteMedic platform. Clinical services (health surveillance, D&A testing, fitness assessments) are priced per worker through the platform — your clients pay for what they use.

Starter
£149/mo
+VAT · up to 2 medics
  • Treatment logging & RIDDOR flagging
  • Worker health profiles (up to 500)
  • Weekly safety reports
  • Offline-first mobile app
  • 1 organisation · 1 site
  • Email support
